title: Cardiology Research Assistant
description: Assist in outpatient clinic and support data collection for heart failure research studies.
requirements: Basic ECG knowledge, 2nd-year medical student or above

title: Pediatric Ward Student Helper
description: Support pediatric nurses with day-to-day tasks and assist in play therapy activities.

title: Surgical Prep Assistant
description: Help prepare ORs, organize instruments, and observe orthopedic surgeries.

title: Neurodiagnostics Support Assistant
description: Shadow neurologists, assist in EEG test setups and patient coordination.
requirements: Comfort interacting with patients, fluent in German

title: ED Triage Assistant
description: Support triage desk, observe trauma team, and assist with patient flow.
requirements: Completed clinical rotations in internal medicine

title: Radiology Workflow Assistant
description: Assist radiology staff with patient intake, scan scheduling, and clerical work.
requirements: Fluent in German and basic anatomy knowledge

title: Inpatient Rounds Observer
description: Join internal medicine rounds and help with digital record updates.

title: Clinical Photography Assistant
description: Assist in documentation of skin conditions and maintain image database.

title: Operating Room Observer
description: Observe surgical procedures, help prepare case summaries for teaching.

title: Mental Health Assistant
description: Assist in group therapy sessions and patient documentation.
